subject: Welcome to ReeMail!
body:
Welcome, to ReeMail, the most memeable email service around! There's a couple things you should know about ReeMail:

- We are DEDICATED to customer service! If you encounter a problem, don't hesitate to use our support channel within discord, #ctf-open
- ReeMail uses [Markdown](https://guides.github.com/features/mastering-markdown/) for rendering emails, a revolutionary move in today's boring, HTML based world
- There is a [Directory](/users) of all ReeMail users available at all times in the navbar
